map.utils module¶

Utility methods to generate GeoJSON files and compute distances

map.utils.generateGeoJson(geometry)[source]¶

generate GeoJSON from a geomtry for easy plotting of the borders

Parameters:geometry – the generated GeoJSON of a geometry
Rtpye:GeoJson format of geometry
map.utils.getNextPoint(point, offset, bearing)[source]¶

get next point from the given point at a distance and bearing

Parameters:
  • point – point to be based upon the next point
  • offset – the distance to be calculated to get the next point
  • bearing – the direction or angle to where the next point will be calculated
Return type:

GEOS Point representing the longitude and latitude of the new point
